mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_tokens (admin_key, refresh_token, expiry_date) SELECT admin_key, #{refreshToken}, DATE_ADD(#{expiryDate}, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) FROM ADMIN WHERE admin_id = #{userName}
mapper.select: SELECT refresh_token, expiry_date FROM refresh_tokens WHERE ADMIN_KEY = (SELECT ADMIN_KEY FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{userName}) AND expiry_date > NOW()
SELECT admin_id AS userName, role, refresh_token, expiry_date FROM refresh_tokens a INNER JOIN admin b ON a.admin_key = b.admin_key WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken} AND expiry_date > NOW()
